CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A new series of donor - acceptor ( D-A ) conjugated random terpolymers ( PBDTT-DPP-TPD ) were synthesized from electron - rich thienyl-substituted benzo[1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene ( BDTT ) , in conjugation with two electron - deficient units , pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione ( DPP ) and thieno [3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6-dione ( TPD ) , of different electron - withdrawing strengths.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| PBDTT        |
| BDTT         |
| DPP          |
| TPD          |
| PBDTT-DPP     |
| PBDTT-TPD     |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| PBDTT        |
| BDTT         |
| DPP          |
| TPD          |
| PBDTT-DPP     |
| PBDTT-TPD     |

Explanation:

* PBDTT, BDTT, DPP, and TPD are all material names mentioned in the paragraph.
* "A new series of donor-acceptor (D-A) conjugated random terpolymers" is a description of the materials, not the names themselves.
* "were synthesized from electron-rich thienyl-substituted benzo[1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene (BDTT), in conjugation with two electron-deficient units, pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione (DPP) and thieno [3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6-dione (TPD), of different electron-withdrawing strengths" is a description of how the materials were made, not the names of the materials.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A new series of donor - acceptor ( D-A ) conjugated random terpolymers ( PBDTT-DPP-TPD ) were synthesized from electron - rich thienyl-substituted benzo[1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene ( BDTT ) , in conjugation with two electron - deficient units , pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione ( DPP ) and thieno [3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6-dione ( TPD ) , of different electron - withdrawing strengths.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| new series of donor-acceptor (D-A) conjugated random terpolymers (PBDTT-DPP-TPD) |
| electron-rich thienyl-substituted benzo[1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene (BDTT) |
| electron-deficient unit, pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione (DPP) |
| electron-deficient unit, thieno [3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6-dione (TPD) |
| electron-rich and electron-deficient units |
| different electron-withdrawing strengths |
| BDTT |
| DPP |
| TPD |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| new series of donor-acceptor (D-A) conjugated random terpolymers (PBDTT-DPP-TPD) |
| electron-rich thienyl-substituted benzo[1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene (BDTT) |
| electron-deficient unit, pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione (DPP) |
| electron-deficient unit, thieno [3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6-dione (TPD) |
| different electron-withdrawing strengths of DPP and TPD |

Note: The entities "electron-rich" and "electron-deficient" are considered as modifiers for the property names "thienyl-substituted benzo[1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene (BDTT)" and "units, pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione (DPP) and thieno [3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6-dione (TPD)" respectively. Therefore, they are included in the property names.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A new series of donor - acceptor ( D-A ) conjugated random terpolymers ( PBDTT-DPP-TPD ) were synthesized from electron - rich thienyl-substituted benzo[1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene ( BDTT ) , in conjugation with two electron - deficient units , pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione ( DPP ) and thieno [3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6-dione ( TPD ) , of different electron - withdrawing strengths.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| new series of donor-acceptor (D-A) conjugated random terpolymers (PBDTT-DPP-TPD) |
| electron-rich thienyl-substituted benzo[1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene (BDTT) |
| two electron-deficient units |
| pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione (DPP) |
| thieno [3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6-dione (TPD) |
| electron-withdrawing strengths of DPP and TPD |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| new series of donor-acceptor (D-A) conjugated random terpolymers (PBDTT-DPP-TPD) |
| electron-rich thienyl-substituted benzo[1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene (BDTT) |
| pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione (DPP) |
| thieno [3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6-dione (TPD) |
| electron-withdrawing strengths of DPP and TPD |

Explanation:

* "A new series of donor-acceptor (D-A) conjugated random terpolymers (PBDTT-DPP-TPD)" is a material property, specifically a type of polymer.
* "electron-rich thienyl-substituted benzo[1,2b:4,5-b′]dithiophene (BDTT)" is a material property, specifically a type of electron-rich unit.
* "pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione (DPP)" and "thieno [3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6-dione (TPD)" are material properties, specifically types of electron-deficient units.
* "electron-withdrawing strengths of DPP and TPD" is a material property, specifically a value describing the degree to which these units withdraw electrons.
